title: Jesus, Savior, Son Of God
presentation: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6

v2: Thou the sinner's death hast died,
For our sins Thy flesh was torn,
v3: Thou hast bought us with Thy blood;
Thou hast wiped the debt away,
Nothing left for us to pay;
v4: Nothing left for us to bear,
Nothing left for us to share
But the pardon and the bliss,
But the love, the light, the peace.
v5: I to Thee will look and live,
v6: I would rise to Thee above,
I would look, and praise, and love.
